channel.title: 667/704 Player list command

item.title: 667/704 Player list command
item.dc:creator: @crackrock crackrock
item.description:
@crackrock wrote:

hey, I have been trying to convert my playerlist command from RS2HD 562 to 704. I am very close, only problem is… it will only show one player on the list… heres the code please help someone :C

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { int number = 0; for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++){ player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, ""); } for (Player p5 : World.getPlayers()) { if(p5 == null) continue; number++; player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 2, "LegitScape - PlayerList"); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16, "There are currently " + World.getPlayers().size() + " players playing " + Settings.SERVER_NAME + "."); player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, (16+number), "("+p5.getIndex()+")" +p5.username); return true; } }

Read full topic
